message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14000. What are your thoughts?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product and understand its worth to you. However, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to $12000?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. Considering the value you placed on the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $13500. This is the best I can do at this time. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate the offer, but I'm still looking to stay within my preferred range. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $13000?

Bob, I understand you're still looking to save a bit, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $13250. This is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal. What do you think?

Alice, thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to consider $13100 as a potential price for the product. This would allow me to stay within my budget while still acquiring a valuable item. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

Bob, I'm glad we're getting close to a deal. However, I'm still not comfortable with $13100. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but this time I'll offer it to you for $13300. This is my final concession. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, thank you for your patience and willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to offer $13200 for the product. This price allows me to stay within my budget while still acquiring a valuable item. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13200. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm starting to lose interest in continuing the negotiation. I'll offer it to you for $13500 one last time. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to explore other options.

Alice, thank you for your efforts in negotiating. I'm willing to offer $13400 for the product. This price allows me to stay within my budget while still acquiring a valuable item. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
